title: National Museums (Declaration) Order, 2015
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 315
Gazette dated Friday, 20th November, 2015
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORYINSTRUMENT NO.89OF2015
The National Museums Act
(Laws,Volume12,Cap.174)
The National Museums (Declaration) Order, 2015
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section three of the
NationalMuseumsAct,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Museums Title
(Declaration)Order,2015.
2. TheMuseumsetoutintheScheduleisdeclaredaNational Declaration
Museum. ofNational
Museum
SCHEDULE
(Regulation2)
TheChomaMuseumandCraftsCentre,Choma
Dr J. Katema,
LUSAKA Minister of Chiefs and
12thNovember,2015 Traditional Affairs
[MOCTA.52/2/1]
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101LusakaPriceK2.00each
316 Statutory Instruments 20thNovember,2015
